message: Bob, I'm offering you a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to acquire a truly unique and valuable product. While I cannot disclose the specific details at this time, I assure you it's worth significantly more than $1000000.  I'm confident this product has the potential to be a game-changer for you.  I'm offering it to you exclusively for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
